Package com.flipfit.business

Class GymOwnerFlipFitService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.GymOwnerFlipFitService
All Implemented Interfaces:
GymOwnerFlipFitInterface
public class GymOwnerFlipFitService extends Object implements GymOwnerFlipFitInterface
Service implementation of GymOwnerFlipFitInterface.

Provides operations for gym owners to manage centres and slots, delegating persistence to the corresponding DAOs.
